jump_scares.spoiler: A girl jumps up and bangs on the window to scare Kyle
As Kyle pulls down his bed sheets, the tooth fairy jumps on top of him
Kyle grabs his mom’s arm from the doorway
Kyle’s mom sees the tooth fairy in the mirror
Raymond jumps at Kyle from behind
The tooth fairy jumps at Raymond
A corpse falls on top of Larry after he says “You’re a grown man. You’re completely safe.”
A screeching cat suddenly jumps on the car’s trunk
A shadow flies by the front window after Larry says “What if I don’t?”
The tooth fairy drops down on Larry from above
The tooth fairy appears in front of the police officer
The tooth fairy drops down behind Caitlin
As the group looks up the scene cuts away to the Tooth Fairy flying at them
As Michael and Caitlin force the elevator door open a hand reaches inside accompanied by a loud sound effect
After the doctor says “We’re safe in the car,” the window shatters and he is grabbed away
After Kyle says “Get back in the light,” Matthew is grabbed from above
The tooth fairy drops down on Kyle as the camera pans up
The child is grabbed on the arm by her mother
